entries.npc_1_1: Hello there! You might be asking yourself why someone like me would be here on a planet like this, aren't you? Well, I am a representative of Star Tours, a travel agency known Galaxy-wide. We're conducting surveys on possible future business expansions. Hey! Perhaps you might be able to help? Would you be interested in helping us?
entries.npc_2_1: Spectacular! All we need is for you to go to this building and explore the area. We'll ask other passerbys if they'll do the same for us as well. Just get a feel of the place, and ask yourself "Is this the type of place I would bring my family on vacation". We'll eventually meet up again and I'll then ask you what your opinion of the place is.
entries.npc_3_1: Ah, what a shame. To think I had a couple of tickets that I was thinking of giving away for our new cruiseliner, the Tzarina. Well, tickets for whenever it gets back from it's voyage. Well, ta-ta!
entries.npc_4_1: Well, if you're familiar with us, you'll know that we sell exciting tours across the galaxy. We're looking into offering a new way of exploring the galaxy that we call home, in what we call a "safari". One of the highlights will be to show off indigenous structures to explore, all safely of course.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Good! All we need is for you to go to this building and explore the area. We'll ask other passerbys if they'll do the same for us as well. Just get a feel of the place, and ask yourself "Is this the type of place I would bring my family on vacation". We'll eventually meet up again and I'll then ask you what your opinion of the place is.
entries.npc_reset: Ah, what a shame. To think I had a couple of tickets that I was thinking of giving away for our new cruiseliner, the Tzarina. Well, tickets for whenever it gets back from it's voyage. Well, ta-ta!
entries.player_reset: I've decided to do something else.
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.waypoint_description_1: An old temple that the travel agent has assured you is perfectly safe.
